<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Business rule 1</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

if(previous.priority.changes())
	{
		gs.eventQueue('Demo event registry notification',current,gs.getUserDisplayName(),current.priority);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-22 09:54:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0981e4b92f2d1410c5a950492799b6f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Business rule 1</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Application1" source="x_501390_applicati">8dcf48cc2f195010c5a950492799b610</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application1">8dcf48cc2f195010c5a950492799b610</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0981e4b92f2d1410c5a950492799b6f8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-22 09:54:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0981e4b92f2d1410c5a950492799b6f8"/></record_update>
